subject: Madison Square Garden
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Entry to a Knicks game once required a gold credit card and a bank account with at least one comma. Now all fans need is a pair of scissors and a hammer to smash the piggy bank.
snippet: Entry to a Knicks game once required a gold credit card and a bank account with at least one comma. Now all fans need is a pair of scissors and a hammer to smash the piggy bank.
